Summary: Had to run to the store, on the way back i saw a smokey sphere like star at the end of road.
Object Shape: Oval, Sphere, Square, Rectagular, Star-like, Other, Unknown
divs: Sighting Detailsi was going through my diary today and discovered another sighting. i had to run back to the store at 11:45 on my return down a clearing in the road i saw a smokey sphere like star. i solwed down only briefly to look and went on home, dismissing it. until i happened to remember early one morning at between 430am and 500am i saw the same smokey srar like sphere for over 20 minutes driving along sr. 51 going to mayo, through the clear cut patches in the woods. it was clear, i could see tiny stars all around but this one just stood out from all the rest. i was calm, cool and collected, and a bit curious as to what this object might be. i lost sight of it when i reached town. but no way was i going to stop in an eight mile stretch where noone lived to observe this object, not by myself. fyi i have had encounters ALL my life, some much scarrier than this one. daylight and dark.
Viewing Distance: 20 Feet or Less, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Mayo
There were no other sightings in Mayo on or around September 8th 2008
